input_args.instruction:
'Context: Disease collagenous colitis associates Gene HLA-DQA1. Disease ontology identifier of collagenous colitis is DOID:0060183. Disease collagenous colitis presents Symptom Diarrhea. Disease collagenous colitis resembles Disease protein-losing enteropathy. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene TCF3. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene TNFRSF13C. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene TNFRSF11A. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene CLEC16A. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene GATA3. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene TNFRSF13B. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene HLA-DQB1. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene HLA-DQA1. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene IL2RG. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene REL. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene DCLRE1C. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene ITCH. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene PIK3CG. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene DNMT3B. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene CSNK2A1. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene CD79B. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene CD3D. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene CD3E. Variant rs116041786 associates Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene LCK. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene IL2RA. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene CTLA4. Variant rs34069391 associates Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency.. Variant rs4565870 associates Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency. Variant rs1990760 associates Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene PTPRC. Disease immunoglobulin alpha deficiency associates Gene CARD11. 
Provenance and symptom information are not relevant for identifying gene or variant associations in this context. 
Diseases with related organs or biological mechanisms often share genetic markers, indicating common risk factors. 
Genetic associations signify known links between specific genes or variants and disease risk, with certain variants highlighting susceptibility in specific populations. 
Statements like "Disease associates Gene" or "Variant associates Disease" represent established genetic connections, where gene or variant subtypes may indicate specific risk factors.

Question: Out of the given list, which Gene is associated with collagenous colitis and immunoglobulin alpha deficiency. Given list is:  EPAS1,  MYH7, RELN, HLA-DQA1,  KIT'
